macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Markets Closed on New Year's Day, No Trading on Jan 1, 2026
items.summary: NYSE and Nasdaq are closed today for New Year's Day holiday, with trading resuming Friday, Jan 2. Bond markets are also closed, and investor focus shifts to 2026 outlook on Fed policy, economic growth, and earnings.

items.title: Wall Street Ends 2025 Lower on Year-End Profit-Taking
items.summary: S&P 500 fell 0.22% to 6,881.30, Nasdaq down 0.20% to 23,371.49, and Dow dropped 0.26% to 48,239.27 on Dec 31 amid high valuations and absent Santa rally. All indexes posted double-digit annual gains, with S&P up ~17% for the year.

items.title: US Initial Jobless Claims Beat Expectations, Signaling Labor Strength
items.summary: Weekly initial jobless claims for week ended Dec 27 fell to 199,000, below 220,000 forecast and down 16,000 from prior week. Data supports resilient labor market heading into 2026.

items.title: Nike Shares Jump on CEO's $1M Stock Purchase
items.summary: Nike rose over 2% after CEO Elliott Hill bought $1 million in company shares, bucking broader market decline on Dec 31. Move highlights executive confidence amid year-end selling.

items.title: S&P 500 Closes at 6,867 After 0.42% Drop on Dec 31
items.summary: Major indexes extended post-Christmas pullback with S&P 500 down 0.42%, Nasdaq -0.7%, Dow -0.4%, but all achieved strong 2025 gains: Nasdaq +21%, S&P +17%, Dow +13%. Year impacted by tariffs and Fed outlook.

items.title: Wall Street Posts Big 2025 Gains Despite Final Day Dip
items.summary: Indexes ended 2025 lower but marked third straight year of double-digit growth driven by AI stocks; S&P trailed some global peers. Fed policy to shape 2026 sentiment.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Sets Historic Record High at $88,000
items.summary: Bitcoin began 2026 at its highest level ever, trading around $88,000, driven by strong institutional and retail demand, limited supply, and growing confidence in Bitcoin as 'digital gold.'

items.title: Altcoins Rally as Ethereum and Smart Contract Platforms Gain Momentum
items.summary: Ethereum and other smart contract platforms including BNB, Solana, Cardano, and Polkadot show significant growth, supported by expanding ecosystems and DeFi protocol adoption.

items.title: Bitcoin ETF Approvals Drive Record Institutional Investment
items.summary: Approval of Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs has attracted record institutional investment volumes, with major financial companies like BlackRock, Fidelity, and JPMorgan expanding their crypto-related services.

items.title: Long-Term Bitcoin Holders Pause Selling, Signal Potential Market Shift
items.summary: Long-term Bitcoin holders have paused distribution after months of selling, with data showing a shift to purchasing behavior and significant exchange outflows exceeding $4 billion in December.

items.title: Global Regulatory Frameworks Advance for Cryptocurrency Markets
items.summary: The U.S. develops regulatory clarity through the CLARITY Act, the EU implements MiCA regulation, and Asian markets including Japan, Singapore, and South Korea create favorable crypto infrastructure.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: PS Plus Essential January 2026 Lineup Leaked with Need for Speed Unbound
items.summary: A leak reveals Need for Speed Unbound as one of the PlayStation Plus Essential games for January 2026, kicking off the year with this racing title. Additional PlayStation news and games leaving the service were also highlighted.

items.title: Upcoming PC Games in January 2026: 12 Steam Releases Highlighted
items.summary: gg.deals lists 12 new PC games coming to Steam in January 2026, with top anticipated titles including StarRupture, Pathologic 3, and Quarantine Zone: The Last Check.

items.title: Gaming News Roundup for January 2026 Covers Board Game Expansions and Indie Releases
items.summary: A French gaming news video discusses updates like new board game expansions for Azul, mentions of Baldur's Gate-related titles, and indie studio Aurora Games' projects including Ven Quest.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: All InX Officially Launches on January 1, 2026, Ushering in New Era of 'Exchange of Everything'
items.summary: All InX exchange launches today, focusing on real-world asset (RWA) financial infrastructure and redefining exchanges for all assets.
